content.question: Northern City Bank keeps no excess reserves. Assume Northern City Bank receives a cash deposit of $50 dollars. As a result of the deposit, Northern City Bankâ€™s required reserves increase by $10. What is the maximum possible change in the money supply in the banking system that could result from the $50 deposit?

choices.label: The money supply will increase by a maximum of $10.
The money supply will increase by a maximum of $40.
The money supply will increase by a maximum of $50.
The money supply will increase by a maximum of $200.
The money supply will increase by a maximum of $250.

content.answer: The money supply will increase by a maximum of $200.

topic.text: 4.4: Banking and the Expansion of the Money Supply

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Determine the effect(s) of a change in an economic situation using quantitative data or calculations.
